fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume aims to balance professionalism and readability. It utilizes classic and widely supported fonts for a clean and clear presentation.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen font families offer excellent readability both in print and on digital screens, ensuring easy comprehension of the content.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Clear typographic hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles, guiding the reader through different sections of the resume.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The combination of Helvetica Neue for headings and titles with Georgia for body text creates a harmonious contrast that enhances readability and visual appeal.
